title: Yi Rework Ideas....
body:
Hey so i hear master yi is getting a rework, so here are my ideas on how he should end up. i believe this new form is more interesting and balances out some of his problems.





Master Yi

The wuju Bladesmen

HP 587 + 99. 4.12/5 sec + 0.89
MP 320 + 76. 4.27/5 sec + 0.68
AD 57 + 2.89 
Atk speed 0.688 -- 0.814
Armour 26 + 2.17
MR 29 + 1.87
Speed 340



Passive: Wuju Style.
Master Yi is skilled in the ancient art of wuju, passively enhancing master Yis Attack Speed and movement speed.
Killing and Striking enemies with abilities charge up his Wuju Blade, and grants points in Wuju Mastery. gaining sufficient charges of Wuju Mastery allows Yi to permanently boosts his abilities at the cost of some.

Charging up Wuju blade by striking enemies with abilities allow the next few attacks to deal bonus true damage while consuming the stacks.

Passive: +10/25/40/55% Attack Speed.

+ 10/25/40/55 movement speed.

Striking champions with abilities grant 4 stacks of Wuju mastery for each champion hit and 1 stack on anything else.  Basic attacks grant 1 stack against champions and epic monsters.

Wuju blade gains 1 charge for each opponent struck by abilities as well as casting them.

Attacking with stacks of Wuju Blade consumes WUJU BLADE charges to deal 10/20/30/40 + 10% Bonus AD Bonus True Damage on hit.

On critical strikes this damage is increased  to 20/40/60/80 + 20% Bonus AD True Damage.

Wuju blade maximum of 10 charges at any point and reduces 1 per .5 seconds after 8 seconds out of combat.

WUJU MASTERY. Master Yi may consume WUJU MASTERY to permanently buff his abilities.

Master yis abilities upgrade by leveling up the base levels as well as by clicking onto passive when upgrade is available to upgrade selected ability with WUJU MASTERY.







Q Alpha strike  Range 600
70 + 15MP per upgrade.   16/15.5/15/14.5/14 seconds - 1 seconds per upgrade.
Master yi dashes to an enemy, dealing 30%AP +55% + 5% per upgrade AD + 25/40/55/70/85 physical damage Over target x 0.1 seconds time.
Attacking monsters and minions reduce cooldown of Alpha strike by 1 second and Alpha strike deals DOUBLE damage as well as 2/2.5/3/3.5/4% MAX HP or 55 bonus True damage, depending on which is bigger.

Killing at least 1 unit refunds 25% of the mana and cool down  spent as well as 10% more for each additional unit killed.

Consuming stacks of WUJU MASTERY increases dash targets by 1.
Each upgrade also increases damage by 10+ 10x current upgrade level amount.
Each increase after the first costs 25 more stacks.
50 first upgrade, each additional upgrade costs an additional 25 stacks.

At Level 5.
Striking 6 targets over 0.6 seconds and dealing maximum base damage of 30%AP + 80% AD + 225/240/255/270/285 physical damage.







W Focus Mind/ Meditate. 50MP + 10 MP/ Upgrade.

Focus Mind cooldown 17/16/15/14/13 - 1 per upgrade.
Meditate 47/46/45/44/43 - 2 per upgrade.



Focus Mind. Used while in combat, master yi targets an enemy, for 5 seconds, Yi moves through units and is granted vision of the target. Yi also takes 15% reduced damage from them. Killing this target grants 5 stacks of WUJU MASTERY.

Champions grant 20 instead.


Meditate.

Activatable after 3 seconds out of combat.

Master Yi channels for up to 8 seconds and begins to regenerate health.  While increasing sight by 200/250/300/350/400 range.

While meditating Yi regenerates more health for each second in meditation. First 4 seconds heal 10/25/40/55/70+ 5%. AP per second. Each second after increases healing by a bonus stacking 15/40/65/90/115 + 10% AP per additional second.
Also grants 2 stacks of Wuju mastery per second after the first 4 seconds.
Completing meditation or reaching full health grants a decaying 70% movement speed over 5 seconds, this decays to 1.5 seconds upon taking damage.


Being attacked in this mode stops healing.

Cool downs are separate. The abilities switch in combat and out of combat.

UPGRADES.

First upgrade costs 50. Each additional costs 20 more up to level 5.

Each upgrade increases focus Mind duration by 1 second, reduced damage increases by 3% per upgrade.

Each upgrade increases meditate maximum duration by 1 second, first 4 second healing by 5 each upgrade, and per second after by 5 each upgrade. Each upgrade also introduces a 1% MAX HP regeneration per tick that does not increase.







Wuju's Flurry  15 seconds cooldown.
Passive: Yi Gains 1 stack of Wuju mastery per 7 second out of combat.
Master Yi summons the forces of wuju to assist him in battle at a heavy price of 30 stacks of Wuju mastery.

Upon summoning, for 4 seconds, master Yi gains 10/15/20/25/30 + 5 per TOTAL upgrade amount of armor and MR. every 4th consecutive attack on the same enemy deals 7/10/13/16/19% of their MAX HP + 20/25/30/35/40% AD bonus physical damage + 3% per TOTAL upgrade. 
Killing any units while this is active grants 3 wuju mastery stacks and attacking  champions grant DOUBLE STACKS.
This costs 25 per upgrade, each additional upgrade does not increase cost.


The Art Of Wuju. 125 MP 90/70/50 sec.
For 5 seconds, Yi cannot be slowed, attacking becomes an instant dash to enemies within 400 range , Yi generates 1 WUJU BLADE stack per second and his attacks slow the enemy hit by 10/15/20% for 2 seconds.While active, Kills and assists permanently increases the duration by 1 second, range by 25.
